attributes.action: All benefit claims should be freely available to the public UNLESS THE CLAIMANT DOES COMMUNITY WORK
attributes.additional_details:
We did not know there was a problem with M P's expenses until we were made aware of exactly what they were claiming.
Why do we pay so many people to DO NOTHING when there are so many jobs to do in the community?
This is public money and we should know who gets what - the only way this information should be kept out of the public domain is IF THE CLAIMANT DOES COMMUNITY WORK IN LIEU OF THEIR BENEFITS
